NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 YARROW: Kousa, do my eyes deceive me? I have observed two Quantum Moons in orbit around Brittle Hollow today! Please, corroborate my ocular functions! 2 1 KOUSA: Have no fear, Yarrow. I am sure what you observed was only Hollow's Lantern, clouded over by volcanic ash! 3 2 YARROW: Oh? I did not know Hollow's Lantern clouded over from time to time. Oh... But what terrible luck! 4 3 KOUSA: Why does this news bring you distress, my friend? 5 4 KOUSA: It is a sign that Hollow's Lantern is becoming volcanically active once again - which will bring a bountiful harvest of crystals from Brittle Hollow's crust! 6 5 YARROW: I was planning to visit the Quantum Weather Lab today. But now, I suppose it must wait until these clouds on Hollow's Lantern part. 7 6 KOUSA: I have never visited the Quantum Weather Lab before! Does the volcanic ash impede your journey because it might obscure your sight of the Quantum Moon? 8 7 YARROW: No, my friend.. It is a sense of self-preservation that advises me not to land a shuttle on a lava moon with zero visibility! Workshop R3 8
